clojure:
;; Local bindings cannot be reassigned.
;; Replace nil with any desired value.
(let [my-value nil]
  :body)
csharp:
// var is valid when the compiler can determine the type of the value
var myVar = "value";
java:
// var is valid when the compiler can determine the type of the value
var myVar = "value";
javascript:
// Replace undefined with any desired value
let myVar = undefined;
python:
# Replace None with any desired value
my_var = None
